inneremotions.burntout: read a chapter of a good book

inneremotions.lonely: do something small that makes you happy

inneremotions.anxious: go outside and get some fresh air

inneremotions.worried: read a chapter of a good book

inneremotions.stressed: take 3 deep breaths and empty your mind/meditate

inneremotions.restless: go outside and get some fresh air

inneremotions.bored: read a chapter of a good book

inneremotions.failure: do something nice for someone else

inneremotions.jealous: Take 10 minutes to do something calming
